sentences.sContent: The house is situated near the college.
sentences.sCn: 这幢房子位于学院附近。

sentences.sContent: a farm situated in the valley
sentences.sCn: 位于山谷里的一个农场

sentences.sContent: The hotel is ideally situated near the seafront.
sentences.sCn: 酒店的位置理想，靠近海滨。

sentences.sContent: ...There is also a restaurant serving hot meals situated on B deck...
...toilets are situated on B deck at the rear of the ship and on A deck next to the snack bar...
...There's a snack bar serving sandwiches and hot and cold refreshments situated in the front of A deck...

trans.tranOther: to be in a particular place or position
